long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A calculator for estimating calorie deficit for achieving realistic weight loss goals!

This calculator gives you a quick calorie ingestion calculation tailored to your fitness goals. This can be either weight maintenance or loss within certain timeframes.

ABOUT:
Are you struggling with losing weight? - Afraid of excessive body fat accumulated on the body? - Want a calorie deficit plan that works best for you?

Download and install this handy Chrome Extension and get immediate insights into your daily calorie cut tailored to your fitness goals.

NOTE:
* No doubt calorie deficit calculator gives you transparent insights into your weight goals. But it is recommended to consult with a prescribed Nutritionist or Dietician to better plan your journey.
